imdb.plot outline: What do you get when you mesh the random craziness of 'Mystery Science Theater 3000' with the uptight seriousness of 'Siskel & Ebert At the Movies'? 'The Fantastic Fun Movie Show', that is. Thespottedpanda.com columnist and film critic Michael I joins forces with a bitter, one fanged Renaissance vampire puppet named Garcon to bring you film reviews of the newest releases, hidden gems, independent movies and world premiere trailers with intros from their stars, directors and writers. Add in wacky characters such as Randy the failed musician who never made his dad proud, drag queens, snarky Hollywood executives and puppet scream queen Jaime Love Campbell. With some of the hottest acts in music closing out the show and the incomparable banter of Mike and Garcon and you have the funnest, coolest movie show around.. Guaranteed to make you laugh til the sun comes up.
imdb.title: Fantastic Fun Movie Show
plot: A Vampire and a hipster movie critic talk about the movies, do comedy skits and just have a good time.::Mgi

What do you get when you mesh the random craziness of 'Mystery Science Theater 3000' with the uptight seriousness of 'Siskel & Ebert At the Movies'? 'The _Fantastic Fun Movie Show_ (qv)', that is. Thespottedpanda.com columnist and film critic Michael I joins forces with a bitter, one fanged Renaissance vampire puppet named Garcon to bring you film reviews of the newest releases, hidden gems, independent movies and world premiere trailers with intros from their stars, directors and writers. Add in wacky characters such as Randy the failed musician who never made his dad proud, drag queens, snarky Hollywood executives and puppet scream queen Jaime Love Campbell. With some of the hottest acts in music closing out the show and the incomparable banter of Mike and Garcon and you have the funnest, coolest movie show around.. Guaranteed to make you laugh til the sun comes up.::Mgi
